definition[0]: a man who is a member of a low rank of the British nobility or of a rank of European nobility
definition[1]: a businessman with a lot of power or influence
definition[2]: a business person who is in charge of a large industrial or financial organization
definition[3]: a powerful criminal who is in charge of a large group of drug producers or smugglers
example[3]: A British-born drugs baron was jailed for 15 years yesterday.
